text: @Politics_HubğŸš¨ Russia-Ukraine War: List of Key Events, Day 782 ğŸš¨As the conflict enters its 782nd day, here are the main developments:â±ï¸ 10:00 AM - Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelenskyy announces that Ukraine has launched a counteroffensive in the eastern region of Donbas.ğŸš¨ 11:30 AM - Russia's Defense Ministry claims that its forces have captured several key towns in Donbas, including Popasna and Novoluhanske.ğŸ’¥ 2:00 PM - Explosions are reported in the city of Mariupol, with unconfirmed reports suggesting a missile strike on a residential area.ğŸ”´ 4:00 PM - The Ukrainian military releases footage purporting to show its forces destroying a Russian armored column near the town of Vuhledar.ğŸ’¬ 6:00 PM - Russian President Vladimir Putin gives an interview, accusing Ukraine of "genocide" in Donbas and vowing to continue military action until Ukrainian forces surrender.ğŸŒ 8:00 PM - The United Nations Security Council holds an emergency meeting to discuss the escalating violence in eastern Ukraine.Stay tuned for further updates as the situation develops.
